title: Coming home
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Psychological aspects
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Motion pictures and the war
description: A lonely army wife (Jane Fonda), whose husband is serving in Vietnam, falls in love with a paralysed veteran (Jon Voight) she meets while working as a volunteer in the Army base hospital. An unusually mature examination of the effect of the Vietnam War on the lives of American servicemen. Winner of Academy Awards for Fonda and Voight. Based on a story by Nancy Dowd.
